import React from 'react'; import styles from '../styles/About.module.css'; const About = () => { const skillCategories = [ { title: "Programming Languages & Frameworks", skills: [ { name: "Python", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/python/python-original.svg" }, { name: "R", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/r/r-original.svg" }, { name: "Java", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/java/java-original.svg" }, { name: "Spring Boot", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/spring/spring-original.svg" }, { name: "Angular", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/angularjs/angularjs-original.svg" }, { name: "C#", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/csharp/csharp-original.svg" }, { name: "Bash", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/bash/bash-original.svg" } ] }, { title: "Databases", skills: [ { name: "SQL Server", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/microsoftsqlserver/microsoftsqlserver-plain.svg" }, { name: "MySQL", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/mysql/mysql-original.svg" }, { name: "MongoDB", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/mongodb/mongodb-original.svg" }, { name: "Elasticsearch", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-original.svg" } ] }, { title: "Data Science & Machine Learning", skills: [ { name: "Pandas", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/pandas/pandas-original.svg" }, { name: "NumPy", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/numpy/numpy-original.svg" }, { name: "Scikit-learn", logo: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/05/Scikit_learn_logo_small.svg" }, { name: "TensorFlow", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/tensorflow/tensorflow-original.svg" }, { name: "Keras", logo: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/a/ae/Keras_logo.svg" }, { name: "PyTorch", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/pytorch/pytorch-original.svg" } ] }, { title: "Data Engineering", skills: [ { name: "Apache NiFi", logo: "https://nifi.apache.org/assets/images/apache-nifi-logo.svg" }, { name: "Power BI", logo: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/cf/New_Power_BI_Logo.svg" }, { name: "Git", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/git/git-original.svg" }, { name: "Linux", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/linux/linux-original.svg" } ] } ]; return (
{/* About Me Section */}

About Me

Hello everyone! I'm Marta Cuevas, and I'm from the beautiful city of MÃ¡laga, Spain.

I recently completed my studies as a Health Engineer, where I discovered my passion for combining technology with healthcare to create innovative solutions that can make a real difference in people's lives.

Beyond my professional interests, I'm someone who loves sports, traveling, and meeting new people. I believe that every journey and every person you meet teaches you something valuable. I'm always eager to learn new things, explore different cultures, and challenge myself with new experiences.

{/* Professional Section */}

Professional Background

Marta Cuevas

Health Engineer

I'm a health engineer passionate about the intersection between technology and medicine. My focus centers on developing innovative solutions that improve healthcare quality and optimize clinical processes through data science, artificial intelligence, and cutting-edge technologies.

{/* Skills Section */}

Technologies & Tools

{skillCategories.map((category, categoryIndex) => (

{category.title}

{category.skills.map((skill, skillIndex) => (
{ e.target.style.display = 'none'; e.target.nextSibling.style.display = 'flex'; }} />
{skill.name.charAt(0)}
{skill.name}
))}
))}
{/* Specialties Section */}

Areas of Expertise

Health Informatics

Development and implementation of hospital information systems and interoperability standards.

AI in Healthcare

Application of machine learning and deep learning for medical diagnosis and predictive analytics.

Data Analysis

Extracting insights from clinical data to improve outcomes and operational efficiency.

Process Engineering

Optimization of clinical workflows and development of data pipelines for the healthcare sector.

); }; export default About;
